name: Bank Robbery - Road Rush Warriors
description:
A bank robbery is a very serious thing. Everything has gone wrong and the police has been informed and the whole street is full of flashing lights and sirens.
You have managed to get into a car and most importantly it is full of ammunition and weapons. So hit the gas and drive you are on the highway. Will U manage to escape from the police in this traffic?

Road Rush is a typical action game where you race with the police and fire away all the ammunition that you have. Collect money and shoot from an Uzi, Gatling machine gun or a bazooka. The city is crowded and you must treat it as a crash arena. Destroy the cars which get in your way, race with the police and shoot at everything what moves.
The game is very difficult and requires skill. Steering is simple, slide your finger tip to the left to turn left and if you want to shoot touch the screen and hold.

The game starts while you are robbing the bank. You run out of the bank, you get into your fast and fully equipped car and drive. While you are on the road you either destroy or overtake the cars you encounter. During the fast drive collect money - they will allow you to buy better vehicles and better weapons and ammo. Collect additional ammo for your weapons.

Features:
- Lots of different vehicles with unique upgrades (many different vehicles: bike, truck, jeep, tank, etc.)
- Share your score with a screenshot with your friends!
- Cool graphics and smooth physics simulation
- Designed to look good on low resolution and high resolution devices (incl. tablets)
- Garage mode: build and drive your dream vehicle with custom parts!
- 20+ Vehicles!

Vehicles: jeep, motocross bike, monster truck, tractor, onewheeler, quad bike, race car, police car, fire truck, snow mobile, super offroad, and many more!
